item.title: Postal traffic to the U.S. sank 80% after Trump administration ended exemption on low-value parcels

item.title: New York Mayor Adams refuses to quit race, blasts Cuomo after Trump nomination talk
item.description: President Donald Trump wants two candidates to drop out of the New York mayoral race to clear the way to beat Democratic nominee Zohran Mamdani.

item.title: Mystery of former Federal Reserve Governor Kugler's resignation deepens as real estate records raise new questions
item.description: The mystery surrounding former Federal Reserve Governor Adriana Kugler's resignation has gained new urgency.
